'''2.1.9324''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), '''2.1.9323''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.9322''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is an update to the [[launcher]] released on November 4, 2019.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-11291}} - Installation deletion dialog leaves out '<' and '>' in installation name
* {{Bug|MCL-11293}} - Launcher logs error "updateSettingsParams.settings.freeText: Unknown key"
* {{Bug|MCL-11562}} - Failed to locate library: liblwjgl.so
* {{Bug|MCL-11572}} - Dark Shadow Glitch
* {{Bug|MCL-12076}} - Download progress units are incorrect
* {{Bug|MCL-12077}} - Cannot launch minecraft on latest beta launcher.
* {{Bug|MCL-12083}} - [Linux] Cannot edit version of any installation
* {{Bug|MCL-12104}} - Beta launcher does not update "Last played" order
* {{Bug|MCL-12105}} - Launcher no longer has an icon on Windows
* {{Bug|MCL-12229}} - Launcher fails to start after trying to move Java license to a different disk
* {{Bug|MCL-12393}} - Steve skin preview uses outdated Steve skin
* {{Bug|MCL-12399}} - "Successfully updated your skin" message appears whenever switching account while in the skin menu
* {{Bug|MCL-12400}} - Skin library elements are not centered
* {{Bug|MCL-12461}} - Launcher consumes 100% cpu after starting a game
* {{Bug|MCL-12466}} - Applying skin message will hang after selecting a skin
</onlyinclude>
